message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a method to incorporate sentiment lexicon information into neural sequence models for sentiment classification. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses the enhancement of attention mechanism, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of lexicon resources and annotations is related to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on sentiment classification datasets, which is relevant to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
